scripts.deploy:goerli: graph codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ nftyfinance-goerli --network goerli
scripts.deploy:mumbai: graph codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ nftyfinance-mumbai --network mumbai
scripts.deploy:local: graph codegen && graph remove --node http://localhost:8020/ nftyfinance-local && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ nftyfinance-local && graph deploy -l 0.0.1 --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 nftyfinance-local --network mainnet
